Amila Vergrett (アーミラ, Aamira) is a character in The Wrong Way to Use Healing Magic, She's the commander of the 3rd Legion of the Demon King's Army.


Advertisement
Personality
She has a strong sense of responsibility and is loyal to the Demon King. She has an unusual history with Rose.
